item.description:
As September 11 in the US comes to its 11th anniversary, more and more citizens are questioning the authorities' explanation (or conspiracy theory) that that three steel-frame high rise buildings came straight down at near free-fall speeds due to fires from two hijacked airplanes. Another more sinister theory has persisted over the years, now supported by thousands of experts in the field of architecture, engineering, explosives, physicists, and more. For those brave souls who look into this morbid reality, the murdering of thousands of our fellow citizens, life will never be the same. Nor for those who want to believe the morbid official tale of incompetence, (though no one has been fired or reprimanded), but life ain't what it used to be like either. Escalating wars for energy-rich reserves have exploited our current crisis, as well as our lost of civil and human rights. As William Sloane Coffin said: "9/11 Truth is a very important issue with the power to bring lasting change to our country." And to our world. Truth is vital for justice to enable peace, and to learn from our mistakes.


03 August 2012 - Democracy Now - War and Peace
Gore Vidal Remembered: 2003 Interview [Re: 9-11]
With Late Writer & Longtime Critic of U.S. Empire

 

To mark the 11th anniversary, Valley 9/11 Truth will be showing Dark Legacy - JFK & 9-11. The film will be shown from 7:30 to 8:30; discussion will precede and follow excerpts from the 2012 film compilation produced by Flyby News. Most of part 1 will be presented and a little of part 2. Lowkey, a hip-hop artist begins with "Obama Nation". The next film unites two September 11′s, one in Chile in 1973, and the other in the US in 2001. The film by Ken Loach opens the heart so we can feel reality, the suffering, and truth. Former US Senator Mike Gravel is next from his talk in Oakland, CA in 2011 on a citizens 9-11 commission campaign. Following his listing of US false flag attacks.. out of nowhere we find ourselves on board the Starship Enterprise.. Yes, its true, with Captain Kirk, Spock, and others in a modified Star Trek episode, interspersed with 9-11 clips to make obvious some unanswered questions about false flag operations and the New World Order.

 

Next in part 1 is esteemed and beloved former UMASS professor, Lyn Margulis, who shares about the scientific process in general, and how to be able to observe truth, and to be aware of the 9-11 'official' lie. An original music piece on WTC-7 follows, then psychologists and David Ray Griffin explain why so many people are in denial and will not even look at the evidence. Some of these are from a film by Architects and Engineers for 9/11 Truth - "9/11: Explosive Evidence - Experts Speak Out".

 

We, the people, united will not be defeated, but first we must awaken ourselves and see the depth of the problem so we can work toward a potential solution. A nonviolent way to reclaim a corrupt US government will be shown on the National Citizen's Initiative for Democracy. Following that is a brief discussion on the film with Jonathan Mark and Chris Pratt. Chris is from Brattleboro, Vermont and has produced a film, a website, and most recently, an online video journal, all of which can be found at DeceptionsUSA.com. For previous interviews by Jonathan Mark with Chris Pratt, Lt. Col. Robert Bowman, Senator Mike Gravel, Dr. Len Horowitz, Sherri Kane, Jarek Kupsc, and Joseph Culp, go to GCTV.org/videos and look under the category for Flyby News. For more information visit FlybyNews.com and Valley911Truth.org.

 

 

Dark Legacy – JFK & 9-11
Part 1 – running time – 0:56:00
Part 2 – running time – 1:28:00
